comment._content: That last comment struck a chord with me regarding recent trip to Vicksburg to visit the Military Park there.  Throughout the park, signs depict which unit (north and south) fought or was positioned at each location.  At least a couple of times, we saw Missouri Confederate units directly across from Missouri Union units.
